com.indragie.cmput301as1

Class ListModel<T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.indragie.cmput301as1.TypedObservable<CollectionMutation<T>>
      • com.indragie.cmput301as1.ListModel<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ListModel<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends TypedObservable<CollectionMutation<T>>
implements java.io.Serializable
    Observable model that contains a list of items that can be mutated.
    See Also:

      • ListModel

        public ListModel(java.lang.String fileName,
                 Context context)
        Create a new instance of ExpenseClaimListModel
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file used to persist the list. Pass null to create an in-memory list model that doesn't persist its contents.
        context - The context used for I/O operations.
